Sentencas: Technology progress makes it possible to power airplanes by fuel-flexible and highly efficient solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: A turbine-less jet engine is achieved by integrating SOFCs with a compressor and a nozzle.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: It can be applied to electric propulsion airplanes.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: The compressor is powered by SOFCs instead of turbines.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: However, it is uncertain which type of fuel is suitable to the SOFC jet engine because the propulsion system is sensitive to performance and weight.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: In this paper, preliminary thermodynamic cycle analysis shows that fuel types and pressure ratios are key parameters for the engine.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: Then, five configurations of the SOFC jet engines when fed by hydrogen, methane, methanol, decane and propane are proposed and comparative performance analysis is accomplished.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: Main conclusions are as follows: (1) The specific thrust of the engine is nearly regardless of fuel types, which is about 970-1000 N/(kgs(-1)).
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: The thermal efficiency and the specific impulse of the engine both decrease when methane is replaced by propane or decane.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: (2) The differences of performance resulting from fuel types increase with the increase of pressure ratios.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel

Sentencas: (3) At the fuel-air equivalent of 1, the specific impulse of the engine fed by methanol is low to 1209 s. (C) 2019 Elsevier Masson SAS.
Titulo: Comparative performance analysis of solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet engines for electric propulsion airplanes: Application of alternative fuel
